articles.title: Israel Poised to Seize Gaza City, Miran Named Fed Gov, More
articles.description: Israel's Security Cabinet has approved a plan to take over Gaza City, marking a significant escalation in the ongoing conflict. Additionally, President Trump has nominated Stephen Myron to serve as a Federal Reserve governor.

articles.title: U.S. Aid Cuts Could Trigger Global Health Setbacks
articles.description: Global health aid is projected to fall to its lowest level in 15 years, with U.S. cuts playing a major role in the downturn. These cuts are already threatening essential health programs across low-income countries, particularly in sub-Saharan Africa.

articles.title: Stock Market News for Aug. 7, 2025
articles.description: U.S. stocks ended higher, led by a Nasdaq rally, as shares of Apple jumped after it pledged to boost investment in domestic manufacturing. Investors also assessed another batch of earnings reports, with McDonald's Corporation reporting better-than-expected earnings.
